item.title: Why Does Tallow Balm Go Grainy? (And Why Ours Doesn’t)
item.description: Why Does Tallow Balm Go Grainy? (And Why Ours Doesn’t) If you’ve used tallow balm NZ, you may have come across some that feel grainy or uneven. It’s a common issue, and people making tallow balms in NZ will often tell you it’s normal. While the balm still works, graininess doesn’t have to happen. At PrimalCare, we’ve refined our process to ensure a consistently smooth, whipped texture. And if your balm ever arrives grainy, we’ll refund you—our Grain-Free Guarantee means you never have to settle for rough, uneven balm.
